name: nodemon
description: Simple monitor script for use during development of a node.js app.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run spec
scripts.spec: for FILE in test/**/*.test.js; do echo $FILE; TEST=1 mocha --exit --timeout 30000 $FILE; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then exit 1; fi; sleep 1; done
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.killall: ps auxww | grep node | grep -v grep | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs kill -9
